summary.long: 3 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text: The elder to Gaius the beloved, whom I love in truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be healthy, even as your soul prospers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For I rejoiced greatly when brothers came and testified about your truth, even as you walk in truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have no greater joy than this: to hear about my children walking in truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, you do a faithful work in whatever you accomplish for those who are brothers and strangers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They have testified about your love before the assembly. You will do well to send them forward on their journey in a way worthy of God,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: because for the sake of the Name they went out, taking nothing from the Gentiles.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we may be fellow workers for the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I wrote to the assembly, but Diotrephes, who loves to be first among them, doesn’t accept what we say.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore, if I come, I will call attention to his deeds which he does, unjustly accusing us with wicked words. Not content with this, he doesn’t receive the brothers himself, and those who would, he forbids and throws out of the assembly.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, don’t imitate that which is evil, but that which is good. He who does good is of God. He who does evil hasn’t seen God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Demetrius has the testimony of all, and of the truth itself; yes, we also testify, and you know that our testimony is true.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I had many things to write to you, but I am unwilling to write to you with ink and pen;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
but I hope to see you soon. Then we will speak face to face.
Peace be to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator
